channel.title: [HELP] Adding bonuses to a wearable item
channel.description: dunno whether this is right section but some1 said where i posted b4 was so: hi, i would like some1 to make a code for bunny ears tht add +400 or so to every stat and an easy tut to follo pl0x

item.title: [HELP] Adding bonuses to a wearable item
item.dc:creator: @palex palex
item.description:
@palex wrote:

thnks man worked ace now i have a scythe what kills anything in 1 hit as im owner, and all my gold and silver mods hav bunny ears so they hit 125’s =P (maybe a little unfair to hav a moderator pking team lol)

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Adding bonuses to a wearable item

item.description:
@slay_blad3 wrote:

item.cfg.
Change the 0s to 400
Screw around with it and you’ll eventually know what stats are what.
